All of the items in the room need to be packed, except the items which belong to the accommodation. These items should be left in the room: -waste bin in the kitchen -waste bin under the desk - a big plastic box with a green lid in the closet next to the bed -oven tray/stand in the cupboard under the kitchen sink (I attached a picture) -toilet brush -mattress protector -desk chair I would also ask you to dispose of the following items: -the green broom in the bathroom -small waste bin in the bathroom -cleaning products in the cupboard under the bathroom sink If possible, the command hook for towels in the bathroom can be removed. To access the room you should ask for keys to room A5.
